I don't take snapshots.
I take photographs.

benfiika

I’m a London based event photographer. I take pictures of various events happening around me, From festivals to award shows. I often get lost while wondering around the city doing street photography.

Born in England but grew up in Tunisia and relocated back to London when I was 14 where I attended college, graduated university with a bachelor’s degree while taking up photography.

I shoot to take photographs. Not snapshots. My goal when it comes to photographing is always to capture the moment. I convey a story behind every picture I take.

Have you got an event coming up or just want someone to capture a special night for you? Then don't hesitate to get in touch!
